body_html:
Just tried 0.4.0 (with CUDA 9) on a p3 instance on AWS without any issues! Seeing a performance increase of 1.7x with the V100 compared to the EVGA 1080ti FTW3.

Just a quick question: is there anything that needs to be done by myself to make the code more compliant with CUDA 9.0 or is everything processed by pytorch?

body:
Just tried 0.4.0 (with CUDA 9) on a p3 instance on AWS without any issues! Seeing a performance increase of 1.7x with the V100 compared to the EVGA 1080ti FTW3.

Just a quick question: is there anything that needs to be done by myself to make the code more compliant with CUDA 9.0 or is everything processed by pytorch?
